- none

**Active**

- **change GORISCV64=rva20u64 to include compressed instructions** [#71105](https://go.dev/issue/71105)
  - added to minutes

  - discussion ongoing
- **encoding/{base32,base64}: constant-time implementations of RFC 4648 codecs for use with cryptography keys** [#73901](https://go.dev/issue/73901)
  - discussion ongoing
- **maphash: drop purego version and establish stronger runtime boundary** [#74285](https://go.dev/issue/74285)
  - commented
- **reflect: add generic type arg info to reflect.Type** [#54393](https://go.dev/issue/54393)
  - commented
- **runtime/mainthread: add mainthread.Do for mediating access to the main thread** [#70089](https://go.dev/issue/70089)
  - commented
- **spec: expression to create pointer to simple types** [#45624](https://go.dev/issue/45624)
  - commented
- **syscall: add Open O\_\* flags for Windows FILE\_FLAG\_\* flags** [#73676](https://go.dev/issue/73676)
  - commented
- **x/crypto/acme/autocert: export supportsECDSA somewhere?** [#65727](https://go.dev/issue/65727)
  - added to minutes
- **x/crypto/x509roots/fallback: export certificate bundle** [#69898](https://go.dev/issue/69898)
  - commented
- **x/net/http2: allow configuring the buffer allocator to avoid copies during reads** [#73560](https://go.dev/issue/73560)
  - added to minutes

  - added to minutes
